sentences.english: Modem cryptological theory and cryptological technology are important basis of information security.
sentences.chinese: 現代密碼學理論和密碼技術是信息安全的重要基礎。

sentences.english: This novel CCCA is widely used in symmetrical cryptography.
sentences.chinese: 這種新的細胞自動機在對稱密碼學中有廣泛的應用。

sentences.english: There are a variety of cryptographic algorithms to choose from when performing encryption.
sentences.chinese: 在執行加密時，有多種密碼學算法可供選擇。

sentences.english: These two keys are related cryptographically.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個密鑰在密碼學意義上是相關聯的。

sentences.english: Threshold cryptography provides a way in which the secret key can be shared secretly.
sentences.chinese: 門限密碼學提供了一種安全的密鑰共享方法。

sentences.english: Modern cryptological theory and cryptological technology are important basis of information security.
sentences.chinese: 現代密碼學理論和密碼技術是信息安全的重要基礎。

sentences.english: Brute force attack on cryptographic algorithm is an important branch of cryptology.
sentences.chinese: 密碼算法暴力破解是密碼學的一個重要分支。

sentences.english: Brute force attack on block cipher algorithm is an important direction of cryptology .
sentences.chinese: 暴力破解分組密碼算法是密碼學的重要研究方向。

sentences.english: Brute force attack on the RC4 encryption algorithm is one of the research directions of cryptology .
sentences.chinese: 暴力破解加密算法是密碼學的研究方向之一。

sentences.english: It introduction braid group application in Cryptosystem.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了辮羣及其在密碼學中的應用。

sentences.english: Can you tell us what exactly cryptography is?
One-way trapdoor function has impotents applications in public cryptography.
sentences.chinese: 單向限門函數在公鑰密碼學中有着重要的應用。

sentences.english: Well, we'll talk before long about cryptography.
sentences.chinese: 好，我們等下講講密碼學。

sentences.english: This work will drive research in cryptography for many years to come.
sentences.chinese: 該成果將會推動未來數年的密碼學研究。

sentences.english: Cryptographic hash functions play a fundamental role in modern cryptography.
sentences.chinese: 在現代密碼學中，雜湊函數佔據基礎而又重要的地位。
